name: Beat The Machine
description:
Beat the Machine is an action-packed arcade top-down twin-stick shooter. Defeat T.O.M and his minions by fighting through virus-infested levels and save the machine! Fight off waves of enemies with various skills and abilities. Can you defeat all the bosses and reach T.O.M.?
Kill the enemies, kill the spawners, find the best way to set up your abilities to do the most damage, and survive as long as possible.

Key Features:
  • Controller Support!
  • 20+ levels!
  • Survival Mode! How long can you last?
